column2: "...As expected, you're quite good, Zeno. It seems you didn't just succeed the Fourth Seat in name."
"Well said. Looks like my training from hell bore fruit after all."
"...Yo, Casra. Something's up, huh?"
"Earlier with Echo was the same, right? It's like you're waiting for something."
"Hm, I wonder if that is..."
"All right, yes yes yes yes yes! Cracking complete!"
"Ahem... ummm, cough!"
"Heeeey, all ARKS! It's your idol, Quna! Can you hear me~?"
"Occupied with your mission? Well, here's a message from me to give to you!"
"T- this is evidence of information falsification...?"
"Human experiments and even cloning data... you're divulging everything, Quna?"
"Did it reach~? Did you see it~? After seeing it, how do you feel?"
"All of it, all of it, the information about the enemy, all of it is lies, lies!"
"Well, it looks like there's people that noticed it, but pretty much everyone got tricked, right~?!"
"There's a lot more information you don't know about milling around. Stuff about the ARKS... the Void, there's a whole bunch!"
"Think it's a lie? Think it's nonsense? If that's so, what am I? It's written right there isn't it?"
"Everyone... open your damn eyes already!"
"Stop looking only at your own convenient reality! Use those eyes to see, that head to think!"
"Where you are, where your world is! This is a system that prioritizes enemies and kills your friends!"
"The real enemy? What should I do? Shut up, how the hell should I know?! Think for yourself!"
"Those that can't forgive people that can't think for themselves, they exist!"
"...Okay, to all ARKS listening to this broadcast!"
"You're not tools! Every single one of you, you're living people!"
"Don't just listen blindly to whatever someone else tells you... think! With your own heart!"
"The real enemy, who is it?!"
"... interesting, interesting. Very interesting, indeed."
"I'm praying for our departure. Don't you think so too? ...Xion."
"ARKS"
"Is this real?"
"It's Quna!!"
"The connection was so easily..."
"No, this is suspicious!!"
"These are lies... right...?"
"This can't..."
"Have we been doing this like it was nothing this whole time!?"
"Your quest progress has been saved."
